name: Bingo! Abradoodle Bingo Games
description:
This is it. The CUTEST and MOST FUN BINGO game you’ll find is FINALLY on Apple!

Warning : Bingo by Abradoodle is a super addictive bingo game! Why, you ask? Because we’ve got it all! Cute cats, cuter dogs, and oh so many bingos! Abradoodle Bingo is the bingo adventure game that lets you play bingo anywhere, anytime you want, with or without internet. Wifi, no wifi -- who cares?? Not you, because you can play both ways! This game lets you get bingo action anytime you want, because bingo action is way more fun.

WHAT THIS BINGO GAME HAS TO OFFER -

FUN themes and rooms to explore
GET bingo tickets every 40 minutes
POWERUPS to boost your game
WIN! Great bingo odds
COLLECT the coolest daubers and avatars and stamps for bonuses
PLAY up to four bingo cards
MULTI bingo - get double, triple, and mega bingos
CHOOSE teams - are you on Team Hoops or Team Abradoodle?
DAILY & WEEKLY goals - challenge yourself
FRIENDLY and FUN bingo! (Duh!)
TAKE IT ANYWHERE the best offline no wifi game you will find!

If you love bingo, and are ready to try a new bingo game that will knock your socks off, load up Abradoodle and get ready for the best bingo game experience. Blitz and bash out bingos with your friends on a wild and fun bingo adventure like there’s no tomorrow. Best of all, this is a free bingo game! Pop on over, put on your best poker face and play this unique bongo game! Let's party like it's 2018!

So gather up your friends, roll up your sleeves, and have fun with the ultimate bingo showdown. May the best bingo player and best set of bingo cards...bingo!



Got feedback? Have questions? Just bored? Our friendly and ALWAYS caffeinated team is ready to hear it. Anytime you gotta get something off your chest just shoot our team an email - support@abradoodle.com or send us a message using our in game support centre. Try it out! We actually respond!

Love us? We love you too!! If you're having fun, please write a review. We read every review and your nice comments gives us warm fuzzies. :)

Don't love us? Ouch. Well let us know, because we want to improve! Email us at support@abradoodle.com and we'll do our very bestest to make things right. Or at least lose some sleep over thinking about how to. :)

Please note -
The games are intended for an adult audience.
The games do not offer "real money gambling" or an opportunity to win real money or prizes.
Practice or success at social casino gaming does not imply future success at "real money gambling."
